page.title: 04Asfordby by Ian Johnson
page.content: Asfordby is a village.In Asfordby there are three football pitches and one cricket pitch.There are three main roads in Asfordby.There is a quarry, a river, a canal, semi-detached houses, detached houses,bungalows and flats.There are thirteen shops, a railway line, a church, a chapel, a parish hall, allotments, a cemetry, three public houses and there are some open spaces. If Asfordby was expanded it could be expanded across the railway line and with a giant sports complex and a five platform station. It is a nice place to live in.
